posts.post_content:
Take a look at the boys from Cincinnati.

#1 - Bob Bescher - Hands in Air - Raw - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10924/bescher-arms-up[/IMG]

#2 - Jean Dubuc - Sovereign 350 - Raw - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10934/dubuc-sov[/IMG]

#3 - Dick Egan - BVG 3 - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10089/egan[/IMG]

#4 - Hans Lobert - Sweet Cap 150 - Raw - SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10942/lobert[/IMG]

Any form of payment will do.  Add $1 per card for regular PayPal only.

Each player has two red legs - guaranteed.;)

Actually they were neither red stockings or red legs in 1911, but simply Reds.

Poetic license is invoked for this auction.

The bescher's back looks grilled :D

Nice cards also.

Hi Frank,

I will take Bescher and Egan.  Please remind me what your address is and I will send a check on Monday. 

Hope all is well. 

Best regards,

Eric
I have hired an under-fed carrier pigeon which allows me to sell the Lobert card for $18 now.  It's hard being the last man in the Queen City. :D
